synopsis.text:
Will ing to embrace despair and contemplating the bleakest aspects of life, Nozomu Itoshiki embarks on his career as a high school teacher. With a penchant for planning suicide and a profound belief in the inevitability of disappointment, he finds himself surrounded by a group of eccentric students who challenge his worldview. Among them is Kafuuka Fuura, an unwaveringly optimistic girl who serves as Nozomu's polar opposite.

As Nozomu navigates through a series of seemingly insurmountable misfortunes, he interacts with his unusual students, each with their own unique quirks and emotional challenges. From Kiri Komori, a recluse who refuses to leave the school, to Abiru Kobushi, a mysterious girl who frequently appears with inexplicable injuries, these students add color to Nozomu's otherwise gloomy existence.

Set against the backdrop of modern Japanese life and culture, this satirical slice-of-life comedy explores the intricate dynamics between Nozomu and his students, inviting viewers to ponder the delicate balance between despair and hope. As the story unfolds, one question remains: Will Nozomu's despair prove contagious, or will Kafuuka's unwavering optimism shine a light on the brighter side of life?
